setting_text1.message: If you need to change preferences, just open link Preferences.

thanks_text1.message: This Extension and the former UserJS could only be finished by the help and inspiration of many Opera users and others as to mention:

thanks_text2.message:
• In Memoriam Karsten "kawime" Mehrhoff (†2014), german founder of Opera-Info forum, translator, warmhearted person, with much knowledge about Opera, a friend. We will miss you.
  • Edward Ackroyd, Oliver Roth,Carlo Zottmann for inspiring me to create UserJSÂ for previews in many search engines
  • Opera Community
  • Nickko
  • Alexs for bug reports and searchengine links: google mac, ask, ixquick
  • RocknRolf for searchengine: google-linux
  • Heidrun for searchengines: clusty, yippy, metacrawler.de
  • Furba, dapxin and others for: hint about problems with oAutoPagerize and other pager scripts
  • Vercingetorix for: hints about problems of some previews in MetaGer
  • BigMike for: DuckDuckGo
  • and many other testers.
  • And special thanks to Opera ASA as mother of the Opera Browser!
  • And special thanks to free thumbnail services from thumbalizr.com and immediatenet.com

description2.message: SearchenginePreview is a Extension for Opera+Chrome, showing thumbnails of websites in search results of many search engines.

options_preview_reloadadvice.message: After saving preferences please reload py pressing F5 on keyboard.
